title: where do i report this?
body:
[4:44] summoner (not actual name): **** you stupid ****. die in fire with your ***** mom
[4:44] Dunkmaster Vi: ?

replies.body:
Summoner is my actual name so you are lying when you say not actual name.

Dunkmaster Vi is too cool to use the report function and simply flames them on forums with unspoken voodoo and dark looks the anticipated subconscious vibe expected when asked how to respond to aforementioned dunkee/out-dunker soon to be outdunked.
it is against the rules to the actual persons name
sending a support ticket is your best bet
how do you do that now they changed the layout and everything since i last did it
You get over it and stop being a snitch, now post the full chat, I wanna see how you flame baited him.
thats the thing he just messaged me randomly don't even remember playing with them they just messaged me it wasn't in game so i cna't use report function
you git gud and not feed so people wont ragefire boots at u
it was a random didn't even play with them
you're well known for being a spud. lol
